actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-469.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 343 - 0 (Record Vote No: 477).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1467) to authorize appropriations to carry out the Endangered Species Act of 1973 during fiscal years 1988, 1989, 1990, 1991, and 1992.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1467 (endangered species programs funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1467) to authorize appropriations to carry out the Endangered Species Act of 1973 during fiscal years 1988, 1989, 1990, 1991, and 1992.
